name: Anton
agent_background:
Anton is a key member of construction staff at Belobog Industries and one of Koleda's trusted aides.
"Got a job you can't handle? Leave it to me!"
Anton is one of the top brass at Belobog, handpicked by its former president Khors, which makes him a "senior employee."
A genuine, straightforward man, always boosting the morale of his coworkers with his surplus of energy.

Apart from this, it seems Anton is always talking to his jackhammer, affectionately calling it, "Bro."
An instance from Anton's everyday life goes like this:
Anton, seemingly in dialogue with himself, asks, "Whaddaya think, Bro?"
The jackhammer replies, "Vroom vroom vroomâ€”"
Anton, apparently enlightened, responds, "I see, I see! You still got it, Bro!"
Unfortunately, I have not collected enough information on such occurrences and am not able to deliver further analysis.

basic_attack.name: Enthusiastic Drills
basic_attack.description:
Unleashes up to 4 mixed attacks in front, dealing Physical DMG.
The 4th hit is a Piledriver Attack.

basic_attack.name: Enthusiastic Drills (Burst Mode)
basic_attack.description:
Unleashes up to 3 mixed attacks in front, dealing massive Electric DMG.
During the 2nd Drill Attack and 3rd Piledriver Attack, press repeatedly or hold Basic Attack to extend the skill duration.

dodge.name: Let's Move
dodge.description:
A rapid dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

dash_attack.name: Fire With Fire
dash_attack.description: Rams into enemies in front of him, dealing Physical DMG.

dodge_counter.name: Retaliation
dodge_counter.description:
Continuously strikes enemies in front with heavy punches, dealing Physical DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

dodge_counter.name: Overload Drill (Burst Mode)
dodge_counter.description:
Launches a Drill Attack at enemies in front of him, dealing massive Electric DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

quick_assist.name: Shoulder-To-Shoulder
quick_assist.description:
Continuously strikes enemies in front of him with heavy punches, dealing Physical DMG.
Character is invulnerable during the attack.

quick_assist.name: Protective Drill (Burst Mode)
quick_assist.description:
Attacks enemies in front with a Drill Attack, dealing massive Electric DMG.
Character is invulnerable during the attack.

defensive_assist.name: Iron Wrist
defensive_assist.description:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
This skill excels at parrying enemy attacks and reduces the consumption of Assist Points when the character is under intense attacks.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

assist_follow_up.name: Limit Burst
assist_follow_up.description:
Launches a Drill Attack that ends in a Pile Driver attack, dealing Electric DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

special_attack.name: Spin, Bro!
special_attack.description:
Unleashes a Pile Driver attack against enemies in a line in front, dealing Electric DMG.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

special_attack.name: Explosive Drill (Burst Mode)
special_attack.description:
Launches a Pile Driver attack against enemies in front, dealing Electric DMG.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

ex_special_attack.name: Smash the Horizon, Bro!
ex_special_attack.description:
Launches several Pile Driver attacks at enemies in a line in front of him, dealing massive Electric DMG.
Character is invulnerable during the spinning slash.
Anton enters Burst Mode after using this skill. When in Burst Mode, Anton's attacks become more powerful, dealing massive Electric DMG while continually consuming Energy upon hitting an enemy.
Burst Mode remains active until his Energy is depleted.

chain_attack.name: Go Go Go!
chain_attack.description:
When a Chain Attack is triggered, select the character to activate:
Unleashes a Pile Driver attack onto the ground in front of him over a large area, dealing massive Electric DMG to enemies within range.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

ultimate.name: Go Go Go Go Go!
ultimate.description:
Unleashes a Pile Driver attack onto the ground in front of him over a large area, dealing massive Electric DMG to enemies within range.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

core_passive.name: Brothers in Arms!
core_passive.description: When Anton uses his Piledriver Attack, the skill's DMG is increased by 24% and when he uses his Drill Attack, the skill's damage is increased by 40%.

additional_ability.name: Teamwork
additional_ability.description:
When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
While Anton is in Burst Mode, for every 4 critical hits, the next attack hitting Shocked enemies triggers an additional bout of Shock DMG at 45% of the original DMG.

This effect can trigger once every 0.5s.

mindscape_cinema.name: Warm-Up Exercises
mindscape_cinema.description: When Drill Attack hits an enemy, Anton gains additional Energy, up to a maximum of 5 Energy per skill use.

mindscape_cinema.name: State of Flow
mindscape_cinema.description: When Anton uses his EX Special Attack and enters Burst Mode, he gains a Shield that equals to 7.5% of his max HP. While in Burst Mode, entering combat or switching in reapplies the Shield effect. This effect can trigger once every 15s. The Shield dissipates when Burst Mode ends.

mindscape_cinema.name: Rotational Training
mindscape_cinema.description: Basic Attack, Dodge, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2

mindscape_cinema.name: Everyone Get Fired Up!
mindscape_cinema.description: When Anton uses a Chain Attack or Ultimate, all squad members' CRIT Rate increases by 10% for 12s.

mindscape_cinema.name: Jack of All Trades
mindscape_cinema.description: Basic Attack, Dodge, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2

mindscape_cinema.name: Break the Limit
mindscape_cinema.description: When Anton's Piledriver Attack triggers a critical hit, his Basic Attack: Enthusiastic Drills (Burst Mode) and Dodge Counter: Overload Drill (Burst Mode) deal 4% more DMG for 30s, stacking up to 6 times. Repeated triggers reset the duration.
